channel.title: Your RSS Feed Title
channel.description: A brief description of your RSS feed.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: <!-- LB --> Made a new blog, as Jekyll, which I've used to generate the old one got too bloated for my taste. So I finally got around to try Luke Smith's simple and lightweight lb script. After a fresh Arch Linux install on my new (refurbished) Lenovo ThinkPad from ebay.
